text: Bud' terpeliv (o Mukhammad!). Tvoyo terpeniye - ot Allakha, ono oblegchit tebe trudnosti i reshit vse voprosy i problemy zhizni. Ne pechal'sya iz-za togo, chto tvoy narod otverg tvoi prizyvy i veru, i pust' ikh kovarnyye zamysly, presleduyushchiye tsel' pomeshat' tvoyemu prizyvu k vere, stesneniyem ne davyat tebe grud'. Tebe ne budet vreda ot ikh kozney. Poistine, ty vypolnish' svoyu zadachu, ty - bogoboyaznennyy i pravednyy
